murilloskills.skill.desc.miner: Master of the depths. Increases mining speed and ore fortune.
murilloskills.skill.desc.warrior: Valorous combatant. Increases melee damage and max health.
murilloskills.skill.desc.farmer: Harvest master. Increases crop production and double harvest.
murilloskills.skill.desc.archer: Silent death. Improves arrow speed, damage and precision.
murilloskills.skill.desc.fisher: Master fisherman. Reduces wait time and increases treasure chance.
murilloskills.skill.desc.blacksmith: Master forger. Improves equipment and increases resistance.
murilloskills.skill.desc.builder: Creative architect. Increases building reach and speed.
murilloskills.skill.desc.explorer: Free spirit. Increases mobility and detects hidden treasures.
murilloskills.ability.desc.miner: X-Ray: Reveals valuable ores in a large area.
murilloskills.ability.desc.warrior: Berserk: Gains Strength II, Speed II and Resistance.
murilloskills.ability.desc.farmer: Harvest Moon: Automatically harvests crops around you with triple drops.
murilloskills.ability.desc.archer: Master Ranger: Arrows track enemies for 30 seconds.
murilloskills.ability.desc.fisher: Rain Dance: Summons rain with massive fishing bonuses for 60s.
murilloskills.ability.desc.blacksmith: Titanium Aura: Knockback immunity, maximum resistance, regeneration.
murilloskills.ability.desc.builder: Creative Brush: Fill areas between two points automatically.
murilloskills.ability.desc.explorer: Sixth Sense: Reveals chests and spawners in a 32 block radius.
